ridge.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a long area of high land, especially at the top of a mountain
ridge.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: We made our way carefully along the ridge.
ridge.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: something long and thin that is raised above the things around it
ridge.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: A small ridge of sand separated the field from the beach.
The ridges on the soles give the shoes a better grip.
ridge.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: the part at the top of a roof, where the two sides meet
